page.title: 08Parbold Hilldale,Pubs etc.
page.content: There is 1 residential hotel The Lindley,AA listed.17 people can be accomodated in 7 double and 3 single rooms.The restaurant has room for 60 people.At Bispham Green the local fully licensed Public House is the Eagle and Child,with a small area for parking in front.The Farmers Arms is a popular Restaurant and Public House serving meals and bar snacks.It was established in 1867 but is modernised.A play area with swings and climbing frame is at the back,a large car park is at the side.At High Moor the Public House is the Rigbye Arms,served by Tetleys Breweries,it has a bowling green to the rear,and a car park at the side.On the Wrightington road the High Moor Licensed Restaurant serves high class meals,French Cuisine.The separate bar is only for diners,car parking at side.
